Battery state shown below the days. 

When BT is lost the top/bottom borders disappears.

data.description:
Get a complete forecast of the next 48 hours at a single glance! 

* Modern, colorful and minimalist watchface
* Displays current weather icon
* Powered by forecast.io 

How does it work:

* Each bar represents an hour of the next 48 starting from the top-rightest one.
* The weather forecast ring rotates counterclockwise as time passes, displaying the next hours forecast.
* Primary bars indicate temperature (Blue - under 12ºC, Yellow - under 18ºC, Red: over 24ºC)
* Secondary bars indicate precipitation probability, the more intense the higher probability.
* Large bars represent a 12h interval split.

latest_release.release_notes: FIX: Workaround a bug in Pebble SDK causing the watchface to be partially redrawn after dismissing a notification.

data.title: 48h Weather Forecast Watchface

data.description:
This face was designed to be highly visible and easily readable at a glance. It is an adaptation of Minimalin, but drops the minute indicator, adds ticks for all hours, highlights the current-hour indicator with a larger font, and shows a subtle next hour. The hands and ticks have also been enlarged for easier reading and the date and weather will dodge the hands as needed.

Time Format: 12-hour only
Weather: Configurable update rate and units. Provided by openweathermaps.org. If the weather display is green, the data is old and will be updated within the selected update rate, or can be refreshed by leaving the face and returning.

latest_release.release_notes: Added aplite support

data.description:
OnePlus Life - Never Settle

With the build up of #HYPEORGTFO for the OnePlus Three, I thought it would be fun to create something for the launch for myself and fans alike. 

The core of the face is the OnePlus Logo. This is shown by default with the Never Settle slogan. Flick your wrist; Suddenly the time and date will be shown on the screen for approx 5 seconds before switching back. The date is shown within the OnePlus Logo area in the middle of the screen. In the screenshot, it's June 13 and the time is shown below as 23:29 in this case. The time supports both 12 hour and 24 hour formats.

When the the 5 seconds are up, the watch switches back to the OnePlus Logo mode with a twist, it will show some random things based on my own experiences as a fan and being a member of the community. 

Hopefully others find this as much fun and a novelty as I did thinking of it and creating it. There are a few extra things I'd like to put in but I wanted to launch this before the big OnePlus Three launch, because why not, and hey I made a thing...

Oh and, no, you don't need an invite in order to install this watchface!

Thanks ^_*

latest_release.release_notes:
1.8.0 - added lava red theme
1.7.0 - added notch ;)

data.description:
This digital watchface has been reassembled from "spare parts".  

Hours and minutes can be read from left to right and either seconds or day of the month shown on top.   

Bluetooth connection and battery level appear on the other shapes or can be switched off.

In 12-hour mode, an additional PM indicator displays on the central spare shape, but can also be switched off.

All colors are configurable, including the borders and border highlights, so you can definitely make this your own.

As an additional option, a striped background can be selected (the light color of which is also configurable).

Note. When Quick Views occur, only the time is displayed.


Designed by Gordon Lardi and originally appeared on the Tokyoflash Design Studio. The watchface is published with his permission and sanctioned by Tokyoflash.

Original design can be found at https://blog.tokyoflash.com/2013/05/20/spare-time-watch-shuffles-digits-when-shaken/

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Pebble 2 and Quick Views

data.description: Track your activity with this stylish watchface. Configure either steps or activity time and set up your individual daily goal. The upper dial shows minutes and seconds (if enabled). At the bottom left you'll see your today's achievement from 0 to 100 percent and the battery charge (if enabled). The hour dial is at the bottom right. Switch bluetooth connection status on or off. The status is shown by another tiny dial pointing either to connected or disconnected icon at very bottom of the watchface. At last, choose from various different color styles. The second screenshot shows the watchface with all possible options enabled.

data.description:
311217: update to only vibrate between 8am and 10pm (if enabled in settings)


Another modular style face this time with some heath info. The latest update adds the option of health rings, has a new battery display style, and adds a quiet time icon.

You can also modify,
 - heavy or light Time text
 - multiple date formats (below the time)
 - different colour themes
 - show day (short day & date - upper left cnr)
 - invert

Dist. units are determined by you phone app setting (metric/imperial) and calculated accordingly. Calories displayed are 'Restful Calories' (r/CAL.)

The (health) circles are as follows,

outer-most = step progress
then, restful calories for the day so far,
then, time active for the day so far,
then (inner-most) = distance progress

Daily values (progress so far) are compared with the previous day total to set the current day total (goal)

Across the bottom (for rectangular watches),

temperature number (c or f), 
battery status (outer circle and number), 
bluetooth (white fill left = on, and white fill right = off, 
quiet time - speaker with sound = on - speaker with no sound = off

Original Design by Chimi Kyo.

latest_release.release_notes: 311217: update to only vibrate between 8am and 10pm (if enabled in settings)

data.title: Modular Health

data.description:
GREAT NEWS!! - Now Updated To Run On Pebble Watch 2!!

*Please Visit Http://DowStrong.com For Support And Donations.

*If You Enjoy VitalTime Please Tap The Heart - Thank You!!

VitalTime was designed with the medical field in mind. VitalTime provides a time format to assist in taking vitals and filling out patient charts.

- Includes a large seconds display to assist with taking patient vitals.

- Displays Month, Day, Year and Time to assist in filling out patient charts.

- Time Supports 12 and 24 Hour Formats, 12 Hour Format includes AM/PM.

- Heart beats every second to help visually assist when taking vitals.

- Battery meter displays in percentages, no battery bar guessing.

VitalTime was Inspired by and
Dedicated to my one and only
Tammy

If You Enjoy VitalTime
Please Tap The Heart Above

latest_release.release_notes: Updated To Run On Pebble Watch 2

data.author: machineboy

changelog.release_notes:
v2.5

- Pebble Round Support!
- Wind direction bug fix

v2.4

- Wind direction fix
- Experimental Original Pebble Support

v2.3

- Now tracks your sleep! Before you take 200 steps, your sleep will be displayed at the bottom of the screen. Sleep well!

v2.2

- Speedier colours! Colour settings are now also stored on the watch itself, so if you go back and forth between apps Diago will instantly display your colour settings.
- Slightly shorter vibration alert when losing bluetooth connection.

v2.1

- Customize all colours! Want a green background, black text and yellow corners? Go ahead!
- Write your own text on the watch face! (If you don't want weather)
- Bug fixes and improvements

v2.0 

Big update! 

Rewritten a lot of code and added a bunch of new features: 
- New, beautiful configuration screen (and it should work great on android, too!) 
- Customize the corner colours! 
- Bluetooth alert when disconnected from phone 
- You can now turn on and off weather, wind, fahrenheit, step counter and week numbers 

Remember you need a free API key from openweathermap.org if you want weather on diago. 

If you get a scrambled weather report, try pressing down and then back again.

v1.3

- Some more bug fixes. Hopefully Fahrenheit settings will be saved now.

v1.2

- Option to turn off weather
- Bug fixes

v1.1

Fixed a localstorage bug, hopefully.

Version 1.0

This is my first watch face, hope you like it!
I wanted a watch face that was easy to read even in low light, but still had lots of information at a glance.

diago features:
- Weather from openweathermap.org (requires a free API key) with wind direction
- Optional week number
- Switch between Fahrenheit and Celcius
- Day/Date/Month
- Step count
- Battery %

data.description:
DIAGO: Your clean, highly visible watch face with all the information you need.

- Big, visible time - easy to see in low light
- Customize the colours - make it yours!
- Date with optional week number
- Displays your sleep and steps, stay healthy!
- Display your own, custom text!
- Optional weather from openweathermap.org (requires free API key)
- Optional Wind direction and strength (m/s)
- Battery level
- Bluetooth disconnection alert
- Battery grade A

latest_release.release_notes:
v2.5

- Pebble Round Support!
- Wind direction bug fix

A minimalist graph will also show you your step count values (today compared to yesterday), in order to maintain your effort with style.

data.description:
Cubic is a hybrid between an analog and a digital watch. Hours and minutes are represented by facets, that are arranged in two equilateral hexagons. The idea was to simulate a sort of LED illumated facets.

The outer hexagon shows the hours and the inner hexagon shows the minutes in 5-minute chunks. In the center you'll see a cube with two functions. The upper surface reprents am (off) or pm (lit) and below of this 4 single minute facets are located. With this the exact time is always available. To get closer to the idea look at the screenshots:

#1 -  time lapse from 12:00 am to 12:10 am
#2 -  2:42 pm (grid enabled)
#3 -  9:15 am (thickest line)
#4 - 11:05 am (filled)
#5 - 10:22 pm (thinnest line) 

Configuration allows you to setup line thickness or to choose fully lit facets. Moreover a grid can be enabled/disabled to see all facets (might be helpful in the beginning). Finally choose every possible color for the LEDs (monochrome models are bound to white).

latest_release.release_notes: new config, added emery

data.title: Cubic

Added:
 Time and Date formatting, finally.
 Tired of running late? You can now set you watch up to 30 min fast.
 Weather update intervals.

Fixed:
  Spelling.

Added color configuration
Added toggle for the dreaded ZULU time
Added toggle for Celsius and Fahrenheit  

More coming soon.
Initial beta release

data.description:
I really liked the LECO font. This is a minimalist face with battery conservation in mind. If you have any issues or feature suggestions please send me an email and I'll get back with you. If your tired of running late to events or work, you can set your watch 1 - 30 min fast. Which is a feature not found on any other watchface in the App Store. Enjoy!

Features include:

- 12 hour/24 hour time.
- Date formatting
- Bluetooth disconnect indicator with vibration.
- Current Temperature and Weather Conditions with up to 120 min update time to save battery.
- Weather update intervals. 15, 20, 45, 60, 90, 120 min.
- Celsius or Fahrenheit format.
- Step counter.
- Battery percentage indicator.
- Color configurable for all elements.
- Tired of running late? You can now set you watch up to 30 min fast.
- Hide all elements.
- Hour offset for people that work in multiple time zones.
- Change the dual time zone label to anything you want! Within 4 characters.

Recent Update:

Added all UTCs for remote workers

Configure Bluetooth Disconnect Color

Made icons slightly larger.

Added Sunrise/Sunset as an option instead of UTC/GMT/ZULU

Added Round Support! 
	- Steps are centered at the bottom for the time being. 

Configuration page re-write.

Send me your color configs and I might add them as a preset!


Future:

Something to fill the lower left corner... Email me your ideas! :)

Check me out at:

- https://www.facebook.com/ZonFireApps/
- https://codepen.io/ZonFire99

I have a day job but I still accept donations :). Either way enjoy!

latest_release.release_notes:
Fixed centering and removed leading zeros on 12 Hr format. 
 - Adding and removing leading zeros will be released later on.

data.title: Simply LECO

data.description:
A minimal watchface with a focus on the essentials.

In additional to time and date, Linum features a battery bar and displays weather conditions that have been paired down to save visual space. 

Linum's weather conditions fall into categories (sunny/clear, rainy/wet, snowy/icy, or cloudy/unclear) instead of specific conditions, so at a glance you can see if you should grab a jacket, umbrella, or shades when leaving the house or office.

latest_release.release_notes: Added missing image for black and white platforms.

data.author: Kiezel

changelog.release_notes: Allows custom step goals as well

data.description:
This is a paid watch-face. You can purchase this face individually for $0.99 or purchase our entire collection of 20+ faces for $5.99. You can purchase within the settings page.

If you love our faces, give us a heart to let us know!

Motivate is focused on motivating you to live a healthier life. Throughout the day you can get an idea of how you are doing towards your typical step count for that time of the day. Glance and see if you need to pick things up a bit or if you are on pace to reaching your step goal for the day. We feel this face will really give you the health stats that you care most about and motivate you to accomplish your health goals.

Top Left: total step count for the day
Top Middle: watch battery level
Top Right: total calories burnt for the day
Middle: step goal status based on goal set in the settings (goal can be configured to your average). Black dot shows what you typically should be at.
Bottom Left: time (12hr or 24hr)
Bottom Right: date

If you see a bug let us know so we can squash it! :)

Enjoy!

Team Kiezel-
data.title: Motivate

data.description:
I'm 'chalk'ing this up as a failed experiment with different fonts (that's a little dev humor for those who know the different API levels ;).

Anyways, I wanted to make a watchface with the Monoton font made by Vernon Adams, but I couldn't really make it look any better than it does currently.

It can display the time in 24- or 12-hour mode, and the separators change depending on whether the watch is charged, on low battery, or is charging.

Font information:
Copyright (c) 2011 by vernon adams (vern@newtypography.co.uk),
with Reserved Font Names "Monoton"
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1.
This license is copied below, and is also available with a FAQ at:
http://scripts.sil.org/OFL

data.author: Game Time

changelog.release_notes: -Adds version number to the bottom of the settings page
-Adds ability to update settings immediately and see the changes on your watch (requires online access)

-Adds Sombra plus 5 additional skins for watches that support color.
-Adds Bastion Tombstone to watches that support color.

-Added Master Key support
-Added hide feature to config settings when you choose 'Off' for Flick
-Improved Junkrat and McCree color sprites

-Improved Black and White Hero Sprites
-Added New Black and White Hero Skins

-Added new skins
-Modified existing skins

Added option to customize the ground, sky, and text color.
Improved layout for Pebble Round.
Removed shadow.
Added outline for sun and moon.

-Updated for Pebble 2

-Added 'N/A' status when the temperature is not available.
Fixed issue that caused hero and background images from not displaying at times.

-High Noon issue fixed
-McCree will no longer appear when High Noon appears, only the text 'High Noon' will appear.

-Added Ana to the Hero roster.
-Made slight modifications to help reduce RAM usage.

-Added Output configuration, allows users to choose what data they would like to view.
-Added daily step count
-Added Weekday abbreviation

-Updated configuration page to clay, can now be access offline.
-Added over 80 new skins for Heroes.
-Removed API weather notification.
Minor updates to graphics. Winston's face was redone for Pebble Time and Round. Characters on the original Pebble now have a white outline around them.
Fixed minor issue with Flick Settings not persisting after leaving the watchface. Improved auto hide option and battery life tweaks. Added Weather Underground provider.
Weather now requires a free API Key to access. You can sign up for a free API at Openweathermap.org and input your API Key in the settings page.

Fixed issue with weather updating properly. Added weather update interval settings (15, 30, and 45 minutes).
Added Flick settings, Off will prevent the flick action from displaying the battery and bluetooth, Toggle will display battery and bluetooth, then requires another flick to return to the date and temperature. Auto Hide will show the battery and bluetooth for 4 seconds before returning back to the date and temperature.

1.1  Added battery life and Bluetooth indicator. To activate this simply flick your wrist and the current Bluetooth state and battery life will take place of the Date and Temperature. Flick again to return to the Date and Temperature. The Bluetooth connected vibration is now removed, but the Bluetooth vibration when disconnected will remain the same.

data.description:
Welcome to Overwatch GT!

Features

-Choose your Hero-

Set what hero you'd like displayed on the watchface or if you like leave on random and it will swap the heroes out each hour. Over 80  skins to choose from!

-Weather-

Weather will require a free API Key from Openweathermap.org Wunderground.com.

Using GPS or typing in your current city you'll be given the current temperature in either Fahrenheit or Celsius. Choose your weather update intervals between 15, 30, and 45 minutes.

-Master Key-

Master Key is now available to make adding your API Key for weather easy and efficient. Visit pmkey.xyz and sign up today!

-Background Change-

Through out the day the background will change showing the sun and the moon.

-Hourly Vibration-

Each hour get a vibration reminder letting you know what time it is.
Don't like the vibration, feel free to turn it off in the settings.

-Flick Feature-

Flicking your wrist will show the current state of Bluetooth and the battery level for your watch. To return to the date and temperature simply flick again, easy! If you prefer you can change the settings for flick to be off or to use auto hide which displays for 4 seconds.


I hope you enjoy this simple design, if you do remember to leave a heart! 

The world could always use more heroes.

latest_release.release_notes: -Adds version number to the bottom of the settings page

data.description:
Details:
Time 2 Get Excited is a countdown watchface to the conclusion of the Pebble Time 2 KickStarter. It displays the current time, along with all of the project's details. Thanks to Mathew for the suggestion!

Why paid?
I set the price to $1 in hopes to raise enough money to back the Pebble 2 kickstarter myself. I'm currently a university student, so extra spending money for projects like the Pebble 2 is hard to come by. Thank you for helping my Pebble 2 fund!! If you really can't afford it let me know by pressing the contact button, I'll get you a copy :)

Once the Pebble 2 kickstarter is officially over this app will be converted to work for any kickstarter project and support will continue beyond the Pebble 2 kickstarter. Eventually this app may even be running on the Pebble 2!

Roadmap:
- Integration for any kickstarter project (July 1st)

Feel free to contact me if you have any suggestions!

latest_release.release_notes:
- Fix countdown for new end time
- Countdown right to the finish

data.author: Tor Harrington

changelog.release_notes:
- removed donate button from configuration. after 300+ installs no one donated. but if you like to donate and buy me a beer or a coffee please send some change to https://paypal.me/torharrington
- on square watches like Pebble Time and Pebble, the outer face portion can be coloured separately from the inner circle face piece.
- minor tweaks

* Support Pebble Time Round.
* Updated menu icons.
* Fixed issue with default settings for Pebble Classic not matching presented colours.
* Tweaks to configuration page.
1.0 - initial version, support Classic Pebble and Pebble Time / Pebble Time Steel. Allow customisation of main face using settings page.

data.description:
This watch face was from a request on the Pebble sub reddit which I thought seemed simple yet challenging enough to undertake.

https://www.reddit.com/r/pebble/comments/4gcef9/request_a_face_based_on_a_nixon_watch/

This is my take on this face and proved to be a challenging and exiting project to work on to learn more about the Pebble development platform. This version is probably better than my PoppyTime face and includes customisation as well.

FEATURES

* allows customisation of the following elements:

    hour hand: bigger circle closer to the center circle

    minute hand: smaller circle on the outside

    face: includes the outer square and inner circle elements

    discs: the larger disc in the main area.

You can also set the hands to be solid or outlined as well. By customising each element you can create a variety of faces to match your mood, style and outfit.

latest_release.release_notes:
- removed donate button from configuration. after 300+ installs no one donated. but if you like to donate and buy me a beer or a coffee please send some change to https://paypal.me/torharrington
- on square watches like Pebble Time and Pebble, the outer face portion can be coloured separately from the inner circle face piece.
- minor tweaks

data.description:
Watchface with time shown by "lit" dots on the edge of a triangle.

The time-telling dots are in 12/5/9 format, meaning: 12 hours (top / green), 5 10-minutes (left / red) and 9 single minutes (right / blue).

The central green triangle shape lights up to indicates PM.


This has been built for, and requires, Pebble firmware version 3.12 or later. 

Screenshots: 
(1)   8:47PM
(2)   9:35AM
(3) 12:59PM
(4)   1:00AM
(5)   8:47PM (with Quick View)

Designed by Peter Fletcher, who has designed watches for Tokyoflash and a number of the faces I have published. The watchface is published with his permission.

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Pebble firmware V4, Pebble 2 and Quick Views.

data.description:
This is a paid watch-face. You can purchase this face individually for $0.99 or purchase our entire collection of 20+ faces for $5.99. You can purchase within the settings page.

If you love our faces, give us a heart to let us know!

With Edge 2 we really wanted to focus on simplicity and health. With clear fonts and health as a primary focus, the Edge 2 watch-face is your go to face for clarity and reaching your new health goals. We think your watch-face should help motivate you in living a healthier life, and that’s why we’ve integrated goal setting into this face. Pick your goal and focus daily on reaching your goal so you can live healthier. We’ve also learned that the most important things that users care about on their watch faces is health, date, and time. Edge 2 is focused on the simplicity but very useful for your daily life.

And as always with Kiezel faces, color presets and the ability to customize all the colors to your liking.

Enjoy!

Team Kiezel-

latest_release.release_notes: Fixes to incorrect dates.

Now displays user's steps.

data.description:
Das Watchface für den fischertechnik-Fan!

Das fischertechnik Watchface zeigt jede Minute ein anderes Bauteil an. 
Neben der Uhrzeit befindet sich noch der Name des Wochentages, sowie das aktuelle Datum. Die Verbindung zum Smartphone wird über ein blaues Bluetooth Symbol dargestellt und sowohl der Connect als auch der Disconnect löst eine kurze Vibration aus. Zusätzlich wird der Ladezustand der Batterie als Grafik ausgegeben.

Viel Spaß!
data.title: fischertechnik V1

Check the air quality (AQI) right from your Pebble smartwatch, wherever you are in the world! This watchface changes colors according to the severity of the air quality so you can tell from a quick glance how unhealthy it is outside.

Air quality data is provided by aqicn.org. The Hazy watchface and its author are not affiliated with or endorsed by aqicn.org.

A minimalist watchface that shows your next upcoming event. 

Currently supported event types: 
- Battery (low battery, charging, charge complete) 
- Bluetooth connection (disconnected) 
- Weather events (rain, thunderstorm, hurricane, snow, hail, etc) 
- iCal (vCalendar) URLs

data.description:
Track your activity with this simplistic watchface. Configure either steps or activity time and set up your individual daily goal. The extra dial schows your today's achievement from 0 to 100 percent. Choose one of the different color styles.

Switch bluetooth connection status on or off, additionally enable buzzer. The status is shown by a tiny arrow pointing to 100% (connected) or 0% (disconnected). Enable battery status: Another small hand moving between 0% and 100%. If you like, make the small scale thicker. Seconds Hand can be enabled as well as (color-) filled hands.

latest_release.release_notes: added donation button

data.description: Corridor shows the time from left to right (HH:MM) and Date from top to bottom MM/DD with seconds and battery in the middle. To save battery, seconds only change for 10 seconds after the shake/tap action. The battery indicator turns white when bluetooth is not connected.

data.author: Watson Tungjunyatham

changelog.release_notes:
Version 1.0 is the base release. Everything should be working as intended, but that's what they all say.

You will never escape idol hell!

data.description:
If we want to protect our beloved school, we need to do what we can? We need to become idols!

Love Live! School Idol Watchface is a watchface based on the popular anime franchise, Love Live! Using graphics from the School Idol Diaries series, now you can travel around with all 9 members of μ's. Shake your Pebble and your idol will talk back with a catchphrase! Each idol girl has 2 different graphics to look at, making a total of 18 different graphics to cycle from!

The watchface allows you to configure how often you want to see an idol, at what intervals, and whether you want to enable tap events. Customize your watch so your life revolves around Nico, or maybe make your watchface a Printemps one instead!

This watchface features the following characters from Love Live!:
Maki Nishikino
Rin Hoshizora
Hanayo Koizumi
Honoka Kousaka
Kotori Minami
Umi Sonoda
Eli Ayase
Nozomi Tojo
Nico Yazawa

latest_release.release_notes:
Version 1.0 is the base release. Everything should be working as intended, but that's what they all say.

You will never escape idol hell!

data.title: Love Live! School Idol Watchface

data.author: AFSpeirs

changelog.release_notes: Updated images to work with Pebble 2 watches

Minor text amends.
Minor code improvements.
Fixed an issue where the background colour would not update if Power saver mode is enabled.
On days with a Custom Date enabled, eg Christmas Day or New Years day, will show the actual date on a flick/shake/tap of the watch
Fixed an issue with the date not appearing on black and white pebbles

Added a Power saver mode - Hides the time and date, until a flick/shake/tap of the watch
Added Bluetooth disconnection icon, and removed colour option.
Fixed issue with Boxing day not appearing correctly on the 26th December

Added Christmas Eve as a custom date
- It shows as "Xmas Eve" on Pebble Time Round watches, and "Christmas Eve" on everything else

Added custom date option
Fixed rare issue of quiet time and battery icon overlapping

Removed support for Emery watches (Pebble Time 2)
Removed support for battery icon levels - It will now only indicate low power
Realigned battery icon to better match the location of the Quiet Time icon
Added Quiet Time icon
Added toggle to vibrate during Quiet Time on Bluetooth disconnection
Added support for Pebble Time 2
Fixed an issue where the battery icon was not showing correctly
Minor change to the language used in the Bluetooth section of settings page

Added a version number to the config page.
Updated the battery icon section of settings page to read better.
Removed custom date options

Tweaked the layout of the configuration page
Added support for more custom text:
 - Burns Night (25th January)
 - Boxing Day (26th December)


Known Issues:
 - The Halloween custom text does not work as intended (It shows then hides quickly when the watchface is loaded). I would advise not selecting this in the configuration page untill a fix is found.
Re-included support for custom text

data.description:
A simple digital watchface.

Designed to not be overly complex and give you access to the information you need (time and date).


Features:
  • Bluetooth disconnection alert - Will notify you when you are no longer connected to your phone (via a vibration) and the top and bottom text will change colour (configurable in the settings).
  • Configurable colours - The Hour, Minute, Date and background's colours are configurable 
  • Battery icon support - A battery icon will appear when the battery level becomes low (Configurable in the settings).
  • Custom events support - The currently supported events are; New Year's Day, Burns Night, Halloween, Christmas Eve, Christmas Day, Boxing Day.
  • Power Saver mode - Hides the time and date, until a flick/shake/tap of the watch
  • Quick View support

latest_release.release_notes: Updated images to work with Pebble 2 watches

data.title: Simply Digital
